analysis: The project is a static website about black holes with existing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files. The current theme needs enhancement to better reflect the cosmic and mysterious nature of black holes. The improvements should focus on creating a dark, cosmic theme with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The website should be mobile-friendly and include interactive elements related to black holes.

improvements.description: Enhance the CSS to include a dark cosmic theme with black background, deep purple and blue gradients, and glowing elements to represent the mysterious nature of black holes. Add animations for swirling effects and black hole visuals.
Update the HTML to include sections for black hole information, interactive elements like buttons for animations, and a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon.

Complete the JavaScript to implement animations for black hole visuals, ensure smooth transitions, and add event listeners for interactive elements. Fix any syntax errors and ensure all functions are properly implemented.
